text: Hey , I have a couple of ideas to work on in GSOC. Could I DM any mentors in order to discuss those ideas ? Those ideas sound awesome in my mind but I would like to verify if they are valid enough to make a proposal out of it :sweat_smile:. Any mentors open to discuss ?

text: That’s usually the first step, do ask :slightly_smiling_face:

text: Currently, Surrogates is up for grabs for example, dm me if you find it interesting and want to have a chat!

text: <@UER6P8FNG> I don't have much experience of Surrogates, haven't explored that yet. I am looking forward to VS Code Julia Extension and Making new packages. Could you point me to the people whom I could talk to ?

text: Which mentors could I discuss it with? the link suggests David Anthoff , so could I directly DM him , or I need to talk to someone else ?
